caption: Network Traffic
description: The Network Traffic object describes characteristics of network traffic over a time period. The metrics represent network data transferred between source and destination during an observation window.
name: network_traffic

bytes.description: The total number of bytes transferred in both directions (sum of bytes_in and bytes_out).

bytes_in.description: The number of bytes sent from the destination to the source (inbound direction).

bytes_missed.description: The number of bytes that were missed during observation, typically due to packet loss or sampling limitations.

bytes_out.description: The number of bytes sent from the source to the destination (outbound direction).

chunks.description: The total number of chunks transferred in both directions (sum of chunks_in and chunks_out).

chunks_in.description: The number of chunks sent from the destination to the source (inbound direction).

chunks_out.description: The number of chunks sent from the source to the destination (outbound direction).

end_time.description: The end time of the observation or reporting period.

packets.description: The total number of packets transferred in both directions (sum of packets_in and packets_out).

packets_in.description: The number of packets sent from the destination to the source (inbound direction).

packets_out.description: The number of packets sent from the source to the destination (outbound direction).

start_time.description: The start time of the observation or reporting period.

timespan.description: The time span object representing the duration of the observation or reporting period.
